name: emailight-backend
description: Backend microservices pour Emailight - Application de reformulation d'emails par IA
author: Mbacke Cheikh

scripts.clean:all: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down -v --remove-orphans && docker volume prune -f --filter label=emailight && docker network prune -f --filter name=emailight
scripts.clean:force: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml --project-name emailight down -v --remove-orphans || true && docker rm -f $(docker ps -aq --filter name=emailight-) 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:infra: npm run clean:infra:containers && npm run clean:infra:volumes
scripts.clean:infra:containers: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml stop mongodb redis mongo-express redis-commander exceptionless && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml rm -f mongodb redis mongo-express redis-commander exceptionless
scripts.clean:infra:volumes: docker volume rm emailight_mongodb_data emailight_redis_data emailight_exceptionless_data emailight_exceptionless_storage 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:user: npm run clean:user:container && npm run clean:user:volumes && npm run clean:user:image
scripts.clean:user:complete: npm run clean:user:container && npm run clean:user:volumes && npm run clean:user:image && echo '✅ Service user complètement nettoyé'
scripts.clean:user:container: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml stop user-service && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml rm -f user-service
scripts.clean:user:image: docker rmi emailight_user-service 2>/dev/null || true && docker rmi emailight-user-service 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:user:logs: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec user-service sh -c 'rm -rf /usr/src/app/logs/*' 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:user:uploads: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec user-service sh -c 'rm -rf /usr/src/app/uploads/avatars/* && rm -rf /usr/src/app/uploads/temp/*' 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.debug:auth: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec user-service npm run debug:auth
scripts.dev: npm run setup:check && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.dev:admin: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d mongo-express redis-commander
scripts.dev:infra: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d mongodb redis
scripts.dev:monitoring: npm run fix:permissions:auto && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d exceptionless
scripts.format: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec user-service npm run format
scripts.lint: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec user-service npm run lint
scripts.rebuild:user: npm run clean:user:complete && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml build user-service && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d user-service
scripts.restart:infra: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml restart mongodb redis
scripts.restart:monitoring: npm run fix:permissions:auto && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml restart exceptionless
scripts.setup:user:uploads: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec user-service mkdir -p uploads/avatars uploads/temp
scripts.status:infra: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml ps mongodb redis mongo-express redis-commander exceptionless
scripts.status:user: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml ps user-service && docker exec emailight-user-service curl -s http://localhost:3001/health 2>/dev/null | jq . || echo 'Service user non accessible'
scripts.stop:infra: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml stop mongodb redis mongo-express redis-commander exceptionless
scripts.test: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec user-service npm run test
scripts.test:coverage: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec user-service npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:user: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec user-service npm run test
scripts.test:user:coverage: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec user-service npm run test:coverage
